title: Optimism Completes ‘Bedrock’ Hard Fork, in Pursuit of Superchain
description: Developers behind the layer-2 scaling solution for Ethereum say the upgrade will reduce gas fees and cut deposit confirmation times.

title: IOHK’s Charles Hoskinson Warns of CBDC Agenda and Potential Dystopian Future Amid Binance Lawsuit
description: Following the lawsuit filing by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) against Binance, encompassing 13 allegations of “operating unregistered trading platforms” and “participating in multiple unregistered offers and sales of crypto asset securities,” Charles Hoskinson, co-founder of IOHK, provided his insight on the matter. title: Chainlink Price Prediction 2023-2032: A Strong Buy Sentiment for LINK?
description: Chainlink Price Predictions 2023-2032 No one could say if — and when — the crypto winter is ending.
